DOC.brief_summary: Characterize the steady-state pharmacokinetics of morphine after oral administration of Roxane Laboratories' morphine sulfate immediate release tablets and oral solution and to compare their pharmacokinetics to that of AVINZA.
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Bioavailability Study of Morphine Sulfate Immediate Release and Controlled Release
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on the physical examination, medical history, or clinical laboratory results during screening. Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C. Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs. History of allergic or adverse response to morphine sulfate or any comparable or similar product.
